Iran Labor Force Survey Naser Amanzadeh, Ali Naghizadeh Tehran Institute for Advanced Studies (TeIAS) 1 Preface The purpose of this document is to review the Iranian labor force survey plan. For this purpose, first the goals and generalities of this plan are explained, and then the data cleaning process is explained in detail, and finally facts about the Iranian labor force are explained This document is made by R bookdown. you can find this template and a lot of useful information about git book package in bookdown: Authoring Books and Technical Documents with R Markdown The first part of this article is written according to the reports of the Statistics Center. To better understand the labor force survey plan, it is strongly recommended that you review these reports. These reports can be found at this link. This document is free to read, If you are using any material of this document, please cite it as : Naser Amanzadeh, Ali Naghizadeh (2021) Iran Labor Force Survey: Introduction and Data Cleaning This project has been implemented in Git and the interested user can get all the relevant codes and files in Iran-Labor-Force-Survey
